general.accessForbidden: You do not have enough access privileges.
general.validationErrors: Validation Errors: one or more fields are not correct.
general.resourceNotFound: The resource could not be found.

error.noAccountExist: No account with that email address exists.
error.usedSocialEmail: Your e-mail is used by a social login, please use the Google or Facebook button to connect.
error.noPasswordChangeWithSocialEmail: Your are using a social account like Google or Facebook, you can't change your password on smapshot.
error.linkNotValid: The link is not anymore valid. Please ask for a new link.
error.accountNotActivated: Account has not been activated yet, please check your e-mail inbox.
error.generalServerAuth: Server Authentication error, please contact smapshot team.

forgotPassword.success: You will receive a new password in a few minutes!

resetPassword.success: Your password has been changed successfully!
resetPassword.failed: Password can not be updated. Old password provided is not correct.
resetPassword.emailDescription:
You are receiving this because you (or someone else) have requested the reset of the password for your account.

Please click on the following link, or paste this into your browser to complete the process:

Reset your password

Attention, the link is only valid for one hour!

If you did not request this, please ignore this email and your password will remain unchanged.

createAccount.success: An e-mail has been sent to you with a confirmation link.

activateAccount.success: Your account is activated. You can now log in.

confirmAccount.emailDescription:
Please click on the following link to confirm your e-mail and activate your smapshot account:

Confirm your e-mail

submitted.success: Your correction has been submitted. The owner of the collection will now proceed to a check.
submitted.error: Your correction can not be submitted, please try again later.

submitted.success: Your image has been successfully submitted.
submitted.originalIdAlreadyExist: An image with this original_id already exists in the database.
submitted.photographerDoesNotExist: The photographer with specified id does not exist.

submitted.success: Your problem has been submitted. The owner of the collection will now proceed to a check.
submitted.error: Your problem can not be submitted, please try again later.
submitted.errorIdRequired: An image ID or and original image ID is needed.

roles.ownerIdNeeded: An owner ID parameter is needed.

pose.3dModelCreationError: An error happens at the 3d creation model step, please contact smapshot team.
pose.impossible: The computed pose is impossible, check that there is no error on the correspondences.

locations.noCountry: The location is not within a country.
